name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Arrested!
Just now, Xi'an Public Security issued a police report: "Our bureau discovered during work that a training institution in our city provided services to "returning students" in a fraudulent manner, which is suspected of violating the law.
Currently, 13 people involved in the case have been arrested and the case is being further handled."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 21, Shanghai was hit by heavy rainfall, and many parts of the city were flooded.
The video shows the National Exhibition and Convention Center, where Bilibili is holding a large-scale comic exhibition

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the early morning of July 22, the Xi'an Yandian Street Petition Center
Government officials announced the Xi'an high school entrance examination admissions plan, and then asked parents to leave.
Encountered strong opposition from parents at the scene
Parents shouted "More than 3,000! Stop admission!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The government announced the Xi'an high school entrance examination admission handling plan
1. Seriously investigate and punish illegal and irregular behaviors, thoroughly investigate the examination qualifications of more than 3,000 returning students, and strictly crack down on educational immigration institutions
2. After verification, the cancelled enrollment quota will be filled for other candidates
3. Strictly implement the relevant regulations on targeted students
4. The method of personal query of scores will be announced
5. Fully listen to the opinions of the public and adjust and improve the relevant regulations on household registration enrollment as soon as possible. …

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Around 1 a.m., at the entrance of the Yandian Street Petition Reception Center, after the relevant departments announced the handling method, some parents were taken into the Petition Bureau. This caused the parents at the scene to shout "Release them!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is said that some parents were emotional and demanded that the education bureau director and other leaders’ children’s schooling information be released.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At about 1:00 a.m. on July 22, at the Xi'an Yandian Street Petition Reception Center.
Most of the plainclothes officers (in black) and the reception center staff also came out to leave work.
Some leaders of the reception center persuaded the last few parents who had not left to go home.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, Hu Xijin registered the domestic stock trading software "Xueqiu", announced his entry into the stock market and posted his earnings every day.
However, a week later, many netizens found that the last digit of his profit and loss was the same .99 or .88, and the estimated profit and loss every day was .00, and there were cases where the screenshots had different fonts, which aroused doubts from netizens in the comment area.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/jA0Zr5hori

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/iesl7P50zX

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 22, the Xi'an Yanta Dongyi Middle School parent group asked parents to promise in the WeChat group not to participate in collective petitions.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On July 21, it was reported that a villager from Qiyang was persuaded to return to Beijing by local cadres when he went to petition. Because he accepted the travel expenses transferred by the cadres, he was convicted of the crime of "forcibly demanding money and property from others" and sentenced to 7 months in prison.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submissions
On July 21, under a video by a history blogger on Douyin introducing the Soviet Union's dictatorship and totalitarianism, netizens once again flooded the screen with "absolutely absolute absolutely absolute"
Now "absolutely absolute" has become a new way for netizens to express ridicule in the big comment movement.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, some media reported that the online car-hailing market in Shanghai is rapidly saturated, with hundreds of drivers competing for one order and working longer hours.
Currently, Shanghai has announced that it will suspend the processing of online car-hailing transport licenses starting tomorrow.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Contributions from netizens
July 19, Shenyang, Liaoning
An advertisement for selling melons in a melon farmer’s own vegetable field was confiscated by the urban management

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 22, Xi'an netizens reported that the Xi'an Big Wild Goose Pagoda is currently closed. Xi'an parents originally planned to gather under the Xuanzang statue at 7 pm. Now the security police have surrounded it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 22
All performances at Xi'an Tang Dynasty City that Never Sleeps tonight are cancelled

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/kexEhpqpU5

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Why did the "returning students" incident in Xi'an break out?
Starting from July 18, parents in Xi'an who had just finished the high school entrance examination launched a protest against "returning students".
This educational loophole caused by Xi'an's "talent introduction" eventually became the source of anger for parents in Xi'an this summer...

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: 🐱 Everyone is welcome to feed me with a cup of coffee or a slice of pizza every month~

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of July 22, parents of high school students continued to gather in front of the Xi'an Economic Development Zone Petition Bureau, shouting: "Children need to go to school, leaders come out."
